description: Restoration and cleaning of the 4no sets of double doors to the main entrance to the main concourse at Surbiton Station, located under a canopy on the station forecourt off Victoria Road

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Name: Surbiton District Centre Inset Area
DISIA Name: Surbiton District Centre Inset Area
CONARA Name: Surbiton Town Centre Conservation Area
BSWN Name: Borough Strategic Walking Network
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
LBCASE LB Address: SURBITON STATIONVICTORIA ROADSURBITONLB Grade: GD2LB Ref: 11B/12

decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: This is required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The works to which this listed building consent relates shall be carried out in accordance with the deposited Method Statement prepared by AGS One.Reason: To protect  the historic interest and special architectural integrity of the listed building and ensure a satisfactory appearance of the station building on completion of the works , in accordance with section 16 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, paragraphs 195 - 214 of the NPPF 2023, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
site_name: Surbiton Railway Station, Main Booking Hall
